abstract: splunk inc shares sold by deane retirement strategies inc. .
article: deane retirement strategies inc. . cut its position in splunk inc by 2.4 % during the fourth quarter , according to its most recent form 13f filing with the sec . the firm owned 29,309 shares of the software company 's stock after selling 727 shares during the period . splunk makes up 2.3 % of deane retirement strategies inc. 's holdings , making the stock its 9th largest position . deane retirement strategies inc. 's holdings in splunk were worth $ 2,428,000 at the end of the most recent quarter . other hedge funds have also recently made changes to their positions in the company .

vanguard group inc. . grew its holdings in splunk by 5.1 % during the second quarter . vanguard group inc. . now owns 11,347,936 shares of the software company 's stock worth $ 645,584,000 after acquiring an additional 546,338 shares during the period . blackrock inc. . grew its holdings in splunk by 2.1 % during the second quarter . blackrock inc. . now owns 7,075,105 shares of the software company 's stock worth $ 402,503,000 after acquiring an additional 143,138 shares during the period . jpmorgan chase & co. . grew its holdings in splunk by 9.3 % during the third quarter .

jpmorgan chase & co. . now owns 4,593,033 shares of the software company 's stock worth $ 308,053,000 after acquiring an additional 389,565 shares during the period . bank of new york mellon corp grew its holdings in splunk by 6.5 % during the third quarter . bank of new york mellon corp now owns 4,196,508 shares of the software company 's stock worth $ 278,773,000 after acquiring an additional 254,505 shares during the period . finally , carmignac gestion acquired a new stake in splunk during the third quarter worth about $ 198,193,000 . splunk inc opened at $ 89.47 on wednesday .

splunk inc has a 1 year low of $ 52.89 and a 1 year high of $ 90.69 . the company has a market capitalization of $ 12,580.00 , a p/e ratio of -40.12 and a beta of 2.07 . splunk last announced its quarterly earnings data on thursday , november 16th . the software company reported $ 0.17 eps for the quarter , topping the zacks ' consensus estimate of by $ 0.59 . splunk had a negative return on equity of 72.06 % and a negative net margin of 32.72 % . the firm had revenue of $ 328.65 million for the quarter , compared to the consensus estimate of $ 309.01 million .

analysts expect that splunk inc will post -1.3 earnings per share for the current fiscal year . several analysts recently commented on splk shares . keycorp reaffirmed a `` buy '' rating on shares of splunk in a report on friday , october 27th . valuengine lowered splunk from a `` hold '' rating to a `` sell '' rating in a report on wednesday , october 11th . maxim group reaffirmed a `` buy '' rating and set a $ 79.00 target price on shares of splunk in a report on friday , october 27th . zacks investment research lowered splunk from a `` buy '' rating to a `` hold '' rating in a report on thursday , october 26th .

finally , needham & company llc started coverage on splunk in a report on monday , october 23rd . they set a `` buy '' rating and a $ 95.00 target price on the stock . one investment analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating , seven have assigned a hold rating and thirty have assigned a buy rating to the company 's stock . the company currently has a consensus rating of `` buy '' and a consensus target price of $ 83.62 . in other splunk news , director godfrey sullivan sold 8,750 shares of the firm 's stock in a transaction on monday , december 11th .

the stock was sold at an average price of $ 81.29 , for a total transaction of $ 711,287.50 . following the completion of the sale , the director now owns 207,239 shares of the company 's stock , valued at $ 16,846,458.31 . the transaction was disclosed in a legal filing with the sec , which is available through this hyperlink . also , cfo david f. conte sold 6,993 shares of the firm 's stock in a transaction on thursday , december 14th . the stock was sold at an average price of $ 80.73 , for a total value of $ 564,544.89 .

following the sale , the chief financial officer now directly owns 110,364 shares of the company 's stock , valued at approximately $ 8,909,685.72 . the disclosure for this sale can be found here . in the last quarter , insiders have sold 241,036 shares of company stock worth $ 16,671,392 . 1.43 % of the stock is currently owned by company insiders . illegal activity warning : this story was reported by watch list news and is the sole property of of watch list news . if you are accessing this story on another publication , it was copied illegally and reposted in violation of u. s. and international trademark and copyright legislation .

the original version of this story can be viewed at profilesplunk inc is engaged in the development and marketing of software solutions . the company 's offerings enable users to collect , index , search , explore , monitor and analyze data . its offerings address diverse data sets that are referred to as big data and are specifically used for machine data .
